id.description: Unique identifier of the order item.

order_id.description: Identifier of the order to which the item belongs.

product_id.description: Unique identifier of the product associated with the order item.

item_number.description: Number assigned to the order item.

is_discount_item.description: Flag indicating if the item is eligible for discounts.

is_taxable.description: Flag indicating if the item is taxable.

parent_order_item_id.description: Identifier of the parent order item, if any.

is_quantity_bound_to_parent.description: Flag indicating whether the quantity is bound to the parent item.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the order item was last updated.

created_at.description: Date and time when the order item was created.

height.description: Height dimension of the order item.

length.description: Length dimension of the order item.

width.description: Width dimension of the order item.

size_unit.description: Unit of measurement for size dimensions.

admin_comments.description: Comments or notes added by the admin regarding the order item.

do_not_discount.description: Flag indicating whether the item is not eligible for discounts.

line_item_note.description: Notes specific to the line item.

gift_message.description: Message included as a gift with the order item.

delivery_date.description: Planned delivery date of the order item.

is_subscription_product.description: Flag indicating if the item is a subscription product.

warehouse_id.description: Identifier of the warehouse holding the item.

configuration.description: Configuration details of the order item.

discount_amount.description: Amount of discount applied to the order item.

discount_percentage.description: Percentage of discount applied to the order item.

is_non_shipping_item.description: Flag indicating if the item does not require shipping.

item_number_full.description: Full number assigned to the order item.

order_shipping_address_id.description: Identifier of the shipping address for the order item.

personalizations.description: Customizations or personalizations applied to the item.

selected_shipping_method.description: Selected shipping method for the order item.

selected_shipping_method_id.description: Identifier of the selected shipping method.

selected_shipping_provider_service.description: Provider service for the selected shipping method.

shipping_total.description: Total shipping cost for the order item.

tax.description: Tax amount applied to the order item.

tax_code.description: Tax code related to the item.

variant_inventory_id.description: Identifier of the product variant inventory.

variants.description: Variants or options selected for the product.

vendor_store_id.description: Identifier of the vendor store associated with the item.
